general.title: Protecting our planet everyday.

explainer.monthly: Your monthly donation will help Greenpeace research solutions and to work globally to protect our planet. Thank you!
explainer.onetime: Your donation will immediately help Greenpeace's work to protect our planet. Thank you!

general.lead: Greenpeace researches and documents environmental problems. Please help us to continue caring for our natural world.

greenpeace.title: Protecting our planet starts with you...

explainer.monthly: Your monthly donation will sustain Greenpeace's work to care for and protect nature. Thank you!
explainer.onetime: Your donation will immediately help Greenpeace care for nature. Thank you!

greenpeace.lead: We only have one planet, please help Greenpeace take care of it.
